Title: The Blessing Way (2)
Plot: Scully finds her career with the FBI in jeopardy as Mulder is still missing and the Cigarette-Smoking Man is pursuing the stolen files. The Navajo elders find Mulder's body in a cave and perform an ancient ceremony to call the spirit back to the empty vessel.
GuestStars: Alfred E. Humphreys, Dakota House, Forbes Angus, Mitchell Davies, Benita Ha, Ian Victor, Ernie Foort, Lenno Britos, Tim Michael, Stanley Walsh, John Moore, Martin Evans, Melinda McGraw
